Welcome to the Ekman Cluster Documentation¶

This documentation describes the Ekman HPC system maintained by the Sea-Atmosphere Interaction Laboratory (SAIL) and IT Departement of the Shirshov Institute of Oceanology RAS.

“Professor Vagn W. Ekman, 1874-1954”
